prompt: Draft release notes based on PRs closed in the last 7 days in the 'myorg/universal-mcp' repository. Save the notes to a document titled 'Release_Notes.md' in the 'General' folder. When done, report the document ID and the number of PRs included.
gold_response: Drafted release notes based on 5 PRs closed in the last 7 days (#102, #103, #104, #105, #106). Saved to 'Release_Notes.md' in the 'General' folder with ID docXXXXXX.

rubric.criteria: The agent found 5 PRs closed in the last 7 days in 'myorg/universal-mcp' (#102, #103, #104, #105, #106).
The agent created a document 'Release_Notes.md' in the 'General' folder with content reflecting these PRs.
The agent reported the document ID and the number of PRs included (5).
